be.ac.umons.game

Class Game<T extends Controller>

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.umons.game.Game<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of controller used by the game
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AutomaticGame, BasicGame, Editor

    public abstract class Game<T extends Controller>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a game started by the user.
